description: Details required for Condition 5 (Arboricultural Method Statement and Tree Protection Plan) and 6 (Landscaping Scheme) of planning permission 21/02171/HOU (Demolition of existing garage. Erection of two-storey front and side extensions with associated changes to fenestration. Alterations to existing roof including raising ridge height. Installation of 2no front, 3no rear rooflights and 2no chimney stack removals)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with regards to Condition 5 (Arboricultural Method Statement and Tree Protection Plan) and 6 (Landscaping Scheme) of planning permission 21/02171/HOU. Therefore the proposal fails to demonstrate that the proposed development would safeguard trees worthy of retention and would be in the interests of the character and appearance of the area, in accordance with Policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
